statements.select: select d.reporttitle as titleName from dictcustomer d,orders t where d.dictcustomerid =t.dictcustomerid and t.ordernum= '$value$'
select b.labname as titleName from dictlab b ,orders t where b.dictlabid = t.dictlabid and t.ordernum='$value$'

select b.barcode, a.realname,decode(a.sex,'M','男','F','女','未知') sex,a.age,a.ordernum,a.enterdate,a.dictmemberid,nvl(d.customername2,d.customername) customername, d.reporttitle,lab.labdescription,to_char(a.finishdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as finishdate,a.area,a.section,a.accountmanager from orders a left join dictcustomer d on (a.dictcustomerid = d.dictcustomerid) left join dictlab lab on a.dictlabid=lab.dictlabid left join orderbarcode b on a.ordernum=b.ordernum where a.ordernum ='$value$' and rownum<2

select replace(ib.basicname,'科室','项目') as testtype,nvl(b.dictgroupname,'单项') as dictgroupname,b.testname,b.testresult, decode(b.hlflag,'H','↑','L','↓','*','*','') hlflag, b.textshow,b.unit from ordertest b join orders a on (a.ordernum = b.ordernum) left join ordergrouptest og on (b.ordernum=og.ordernum and (b.dictgroupid=og.dicttestitemid or og.dicttestitemid=b.dicttestitemid)) inner join dicttestitem dti on og.dicttestitemid=dti.dicttestitemid and dti.isonlyforbill=0 left join dictlabdept dlb on dti.dictlabdeptid=dlb.dictlabdeptid left join initbasic ib on (dlb.labdepttype=ib.basicvalue and ib.basictype='LABDEPTTYPE') where b.ordernum ='$value$' and og.isactive='1' order by decode(b.dictgroupname,null,999999,nvl(dti.displayorder,999998)),nvl(b.dictgroupname,'单项'),b.displayorder

select tt.testname,decode(o.dictreporttemplateid,'61','[14C]-UBT','81','[13C]-UBT') testmethod,decode(tt.isexception,'1','*','') hlflag,tt.unit,tt.textshow,tt.testresult from ordertest tt,orders o where tt.ordernum=o.ordernum and tt.ordernum='$value$'

select ordernum,finishdate from( select ordernum,to_char(nvl(t1.createdate,finishdate),'yyyy-MM-dd') as finishdate from orders t1,dictmember t2 where iscancel='0' and status>='25' and t1.dictmemberid=t2.dictmemberid and t2.dictmemberid=(select dictmemberid from orders where ordernum='$value$') and finishdate<=(select finishdate from orders where ordernum='$value$') order by finishdate desc )t where rownum<=5

select tbdanxiang.testname,nvl(tbgroup.testname,'单项') dictgroupname,g.* from dicttestitem tbdanxiang inner join ( select t.dicttestitemid,t.dictgroupid,max(result1) FIVETESTRESULT,max(result2) FOURTESTRESULT,max(result3) THREETESTRESULT,max(result4) TWOTESTRESULT,max(result5) ONETESTRESULT,'$date1$' FIVETESTDATE,'$date2$' FOURTESTDATE,'$date3$' THREETESTDATE,'$date4$' TWOTESTDATE,'$date5$' ONETESTDATE from ( select ot1.dicttestitemid,ot1.dictgroupid,(ot1.testresult||decode(ot1.hlflag,'H','(↑)','L','(↓)','*','(*)','')) result1, null result2,null result3, null result4, null result5 from ordertest ot1 where ot1.ordernum='$ordernum1$' and ot1.isactive='1'
union select ot2.dicttestitemid,ot2.dictgroupid,null result1, (ot2.testresult||decode(ot2.hlflag,'H','(↑)','L','(↓)','*','(*)','')) result2,null result3, null result4, null result5 from ordertest ot2 where ot2.ordernum='$ordernum2$' and ot2.isactive='1'
union select ot3.dicttestitemid,ot3.dictgroupid,null result1, null result2,(ot3.testresult||decode(ot3.hlflag,'H','(↑)','L','(↓)','*','(*)','')) result3, null result4, null result5 from ordertest ot3 where ot3.ordernum='$ordernum3$' and ot3.isactive='1'
union select ot4.dicttestitemid,ot4.dictgroupid,null result1, null result2,null result3, (ot4.testresult||decode(ot4.hlflag,'H','(↑)','L','(↓)','*','(*)','')) result4, null result5 from ordertest ot4 where ot4.ordernum='$ordernum4$' and ot4.isactive='1'
union select ot5.dicttestitemid,ot5.dictgroupid,null result1, null result2,null result3, null result4, (ot5.testresult||decode(ot5.hlflag,'H','(↑)','L','(↓)','*','(*)','')) result5 from ordertest ot5 where ot5.ordernum='$ordernum5$' and ot5.isactive='1' )t group by t.dicttestitemid,t.dictgroupid having max(result1) is not null )g on tbdanxiang.dicttestitemid=g.dicttestitemid left join dicttestitem tbgroup on tbgroup.dicttestitemid=g.dictgroupid order by decode(tbgroup.dicttestitemid,null,999999,nvl(tbgroup.displayorder,999998)),nvl(tbgroup.testname,'单项'),tbdanxiang.displayorder
select a.diagnosisname,a.diseasedescription,a.diseasecause,a.suggestion from orderdiagnosis a where a.ordernum = '$value$' order by a.displayorder asc
SELECT a.testname,to_char(a.rerundate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as rerundate,to_char(a.Rerunenddate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as Rerunenddate from ordernexttest a where a.isneededorder = '0' and a.ordernum ='$value$'
SELECT a.testname from ordernexttest a where a.isneededorder = '1' and a.ordernum ='$value$'

select b.barcode,a.realname,decode(a.sex,'M','男','F','女','未知') sex,a.age, b.collectdate, b.receivedate,i.basicname as status ,(select du.username from dictuser du where du.dictuserid= b.receiveby)as receiveby, b.releasedate, b.releasebyname as releaseby, b.authorizedate, b.authorizebyname as authorizeby, b.hashcode, b.signaturebyname as signatureby, d.itemname,c.customername from orderbarcode b join orders a on(a.ordernum = b.ordernum) join dictlibraryitem d on (b.specimentypeid = d.dictlibraryitemid) join dictcustomer c on (c.dictcustomerid=a.dictcustomerid) join initbasic i on (i.basictype='ORDERBARCODESTATUS' and i.basicvalue =b.status ) where b.ordernum ='$value$'
select a.testname,a.testmethod,decode(a.hlflag,'H','↑','L','↓',a.hlflag) hlflag,a.testresult,a.unit,a.textshow from ordertest a where a.ordernum = '$value$'
select (m.diseasecause||CHR(10)||m.suggestion) as resultsuggestion from orderdiagnosis m where m.ordernum = '$value$'
select a.testname||' : '||a.testresult as testresult from ordertest a where a.ordernum = '$value$'
